OOC: I (Robert Dahl) am posting from rAuq's place cause i'm 
staying the night.

Motormaster's jaw hung open at he new message of Prime's 
awakening. "Doesn't that junk piece ever stay dead?" Motormaster 
spat harshly. If his eyes could have shown emotion they would 
have been burning with rage. "This could screw up everything 
'Blast." Turning to Killfest he started up again, his voice hollow and 
devoid of emotion. "We need to go to the Ark NOW. Will you join 
us on the trip? You can prove you're worth as an ally." He was now 
waiting for a reply.


On 28 Jan 2001, at 4:40, Zardus wrote:

> ::Killfest/EndBringer/Demise/Greven::
> 
> Killfest listens to the voice that announced Optimus Prime's return, 
> showing no surprise or any other emotion. It didn't matter to him. 
> Optimus Prime could arise if he wanted.
> 
> He looked at Motormaster, waiting for the bot to speak.
